title: LatinStoryPages
description: A schema for a complete short story in a Latin-based language, divided into pages with content and vocabulary.

pages.description: A list of pages that make up the story.

englishSummary.description: A concise, one-sentence summary of the page's content in English.

content.description: The full content for the page in the target language, with paragraphs separated by newline characters.

vocabulary.description: A list of key vocabulary words from the page.

word.description: The vocabulary word in the target language.

translation.description: The English translation of the word.
